name: unskilled

Add to word list
Add to word list
(of people) without any particular work skills, or (of work) not needing any particular skills: Unskilled workers may lose their jobs.
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to describe people who have no particular work skills: unskilled employees/labourers/workers Businesses such as restaurants are dependent on lower-paid, unskilled employees. The workforce was largely unskilled at relatively low pay levels.
used to describe work that does not need any particular skills: unskilled jobs/positions/work The hundreds of assembly jobs at the plant are mostly unskilled. Unskilled manual jobs no longer support a family, like they did in the 1950s. The jobs that required unskilled labor could be filled more cheaply overseas. Compare
skilled
